comments.body: This sounds like a Linux only package. If so, please reflect that in the skip statement.

Would this be the correct way to construct the skip statement in this situation?

```yaml
build:
  skip: True  # [win or osx ]
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +39,43 @@    This module provides a way for securely storing passwords and other secrets.
    It uses D-Bus Secret Service API that is supported by GNOME Keyring (since 
    version 2.30) and KSecretsService.
    The main classes provided are secretstorage.Item, representing a secret item 
    (that has a label, a secret and some attributes) and secretstorage.Collection,
